title: Hyperbolic Sine Function
description: Implement a function that calculates the hyperbolic sine of a given real number. The function should optimize calculations for small values of input to improve accuracy and performance.
name: SINH

input.name: X
input.description: The real number input for which the hyperbolic sine is to be calculated.

output.name: SINH
output.description: The calculated hyperbolic sine of the input value X.

return_value.description: The result of the hyperbolic sine calculation.
